department: Department of Energy Science and Engineering
name: ESL377 Optimization of Energy Systems
description: Engineering design and optimization definitions, Trends analysis of multiple physical parameters involving in energy systems, Mathematical model for optimal energy system design, Representative methods for the solution of the optimization problem, Optimization techniques- curve fitting, Lagrange multipliers, Search methods, Modelling of energy systems, Steady-state and transient simulation for optimization of energy systems, Components optimization for maximum efficiency, case studies.
overlap: Some overlap with ESL743, CLL782, CLL784, CLL785, MTL103
